description:
All-in-one command and control platform for BCC2000 & BCC2000 Plus cameras.

Brinno Command Center is an all-in-one command and control platform for BCC2000 & BCC2000 Plus cameras that allows you to access your camera through your laptop via the Camera Extender Kit (AFB1000). Use the platform to do a wide variety of actions including: preview camera frame, change settings, check battery and SD card status. All from the comfort of your laptop!
